sentence.Network_en: Rebellions were put down with appalling barbarity.
sentence.Network_cn: 叛变被残酷地镇压了下去。

sentence.Network_en: The pirates treated their captives with barbarity.
sentence.Network_cn: 海盗们残暴地对待他们的俘虏.

sentence.Network_en: Everyone calls barbarity what he is not accustomed to.
sentence.Network_cn: 被我们称作野蛮之境的,只不过是我们尚不熟知的世界.

list.abs: I simply can ' t bear your barbaric behavior ., 你粗野的行为我简直忍受不了.
It is a barbarous way to extend territory by arms ., 以武力扩张领土是一种野蛮的方式.
翻译词典... ... A barbarous race 野蛮民族 Barbarous sounds 粗声粗气. A barbarous style 粗鄙的文体.

the Chinese police participates , and has the room supervises the personnel is in conspiracy secret society member together carries on the barbaric violence relocates the scene .中国警察参与，并有房监人员伙同黑社会分子共同进行野蛮暴力拆迁现场。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin barbarus (see barbarous) + -ity

entry.def: If you refer to someone's behaviour as barbarity, you strongly disapprove of it because you think that it is extremely cruel.

example.ex: Rebellions were put down with appalling barbarity.
example.tran: 叛变被残酷地镇压了下去。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being shockingly cruel and inhumane

auth_sentence.content: They consider anarchy to be synonymous with barbarity.
auth_sentence.res_content: They consider anarchy to be synonymous with barbarity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They consider anarchy to be synonymous with barbarity.

auth_sentence.content: I exist -- which justifies all manner of barbarity, including torture.
auth_sentence.res_content: I exist -- which justifies all manner of barbarity, including torture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I exist -- which justifies all manner of barbarity, including torture.

auth_sentence.content: Despite the brutality and the barbarity, Syria is a divided country.
auth_sentence.res_content: Despite the brutality and the barbarity, Syria is a divided country.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Despite the brutality and the barbarity, Syria is a divided country.

sentences.en: The barbarities of the last war must not be repeated.
sentences.cn: 决不能让上次大战的暴行重演。
